aleen about us: Aleen Real Estate is one of the brands of Maskan Aleen Real Estate Company, which aspires to achieve leadership in the field of real estate development by providing innovative residential products and distinguished services in addition to ensuring the highest levels of satisfaction from our customers by ensuring high quality in products and services and modern designs that have been studied to suit the target segments.
